title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.6 - Acceptable ambient air quality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 200.6 - Acceptable ambient air quality

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of this Subchapter, no
person shall allow or permit any air contamination source to emit air
contaminants in quantities which alone or in combination with emissions from
other air contamination sources would contravene any applicable ambient air
quality standard and/or cause air pollution. In such cases where contravention
occurs or may occur, the commissioner shall specify the degree and/or method of
emission control required. Notes
